website_summaries.verdict: This attractive, well-made canopy bed features a classic style with painted wood finish.
pros: This solid and sturdy bed is constructed from a mix of hardwood and engineered board
Users note how simple to assemble it is
We love the smooth and sleek white finish and the raised panels on the headboard and footboard
cons: May be too pricey for some budgets

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous with a few small issues.
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous bed. My two little quibbles with it are that it isn't pure white - more an off white and that it has an odor to it. The odor is something more chemical than wood and does not seem to be dissipating much in the three weeks we have had it assembled. If that is something that will bother you, I'd advise you to steer clear. Assembly was fairly easy - done primarily by one person with light assistance from a second to hold things up or in place for securing. As with other Home Styles products, the directions are minimalist and could be significantly better.
customer_reviews.author: CM Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed! I was skeptical making this purchase because it seemed like so many people had issues with putting it together or just general quality issues. We had no such issues. We put it together in just a few hours with no problems, and have been using it for just over a month. It seems very sturdy, it's beautiful, and we have received multiple complements on it. We are very pleased, it is exactly what I was looking for. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SRA

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous bed!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bed!!! I picked this bed out on Walmart and almost bought when I decided to check for canopy beds on amazon, found the same one for $100 cheaper on amazon! It was very easy to assemble with a drill, I couldn’t imagine using the tiny Allen wrench. It is solid wood and very sturdy. The color is more of an off white/ivory not white which was a little disappointing but I love it none the less! Excellent quality bed!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: I just wanted to post a warning on here. ...
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to post a warning on here. I bought this last year with my taxes before I moved to a bigger house. When I moved and finally set it up, there were hairline cracks all over the frame. It is use-able but not attractive. My boyfriend says he doesn't notice them, but it is all I can see. The bed is also not truly white. The frame is really low to the ground, and I don't think it's going to last more than a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful bed! It’s solid, sturdy, and set up between 2 people was maybe 3ish hours. I’m so happy I went ahead and made this purchase! I 100% would buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Kinda okay
customer_reviews.text: This was a bitch about together. Once it was together the posts were wobbly no matter how hard I tried to make it work. But otherwise, it’s beautiful and looks exactly as the picture represents.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: So Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I made my princess cave with this bed but omg was it a mission to assemble. I DO NOT want to have to move it EVER again lol... (Kinda the nature of the beast with canopy beds)
customer_reviews.author: Kate Steere

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Not White
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed so far , it feels very sturdy. This frame is definitely an off white or cream color however, i like the bed enough to keep it despite that, if needed i can repaint it. As far as building it, I built a good chunk of it by myself but due to the size i definitely needed help for some of the spots but with 2 people it was able to be built quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Erica L

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful frame
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the picture. The wood feels strong. We are excited for our fist night sleeping under the canopy. Small warning though that may matter to some shoppers the bed frame only has three beams that run across the bed. 1 at each end and one in the middle. This could be an issue depending on the type of mattress you have.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Osterberg

customer_reviews.title: Broke/collapsed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed but it collapsed after a few years. Not solid wood. Bummer because I bought night stands and a dresser to go with it. Beds shouldn't break, what if my dog were under the bed? I am petite, weigh only 110 lbs and no, there was not any "rigorous activity" on the bed, LOL. And they charged me a "restocking fee."
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Tarpley

customer_reviews.title: This bed is happiness!
customer_reviews.text: The bed is beautiful, dark coffee color and I always get comments on it when people walk into my room. I added some curtains to the sides and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: The bed is not white it is off-white or cream
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful bed but it's not white, it's cream or off-white. I bought my daughter white furniture to go with this bed and none of it match because the bed is cream
customer_reviews.author: colleen m

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful bed. My daughter loves it. Quality workmanship. We did pay our handyman to put it together (but totally worth it!). I highly recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I was unimpressed by this bed for the amount I paid for it. Maybe I'm off on my market but I'd assume spending around $500 for a bed is good money. The foot board came cracked. and the assembly was difficult if you don't have a socket wrench, using the one they give you is almost impossible. And of course I decided to assemble it with my Dad who proficiently swore the entire time (however he does that all the time so its no real indication of difficulty.) So I guess meh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked wood
customer_reviews.text: When setting up pieces were cracked, very disappointed ☹️. It’s a nice bed but when u buy something new and it comes broken or damaged it makes I regret buying it. Not sure how long it will last with all the cracked wood .
customer_reviews.author: Nubia

customer_reviews.title: Bed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bed. Easy assembly and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca p

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Got the bed it was missing pieces. Since it’s furniture not the easiest to return . Husband rigger it together. So it’s up looks good.
customer_reviews.author: crystal cantu

customer_reviews.title: Looked like the damage occurred before it was packaged which is ...
customer_reviews.text: The headboard was damaged. Looked like the damage occurred before it was packaged which is inexcusable. No other complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but difficult
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful but very hard to assemble and make sure you get a boxspring!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I’m so involved with this bed frame. I’m so happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Katheryne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed!
customer_reviews.text: The bed is beautiful, very sturdy, and Mt husband and grandson put it together easily in a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Damaged wood
customer_reviews.text: There was some cracks in the posts when we took it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Norris

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and easy to assemble!!!! Fell Apart!
customer_reviews.text: I had to edit this review. After two years of normal use the two boards running down the side both broke near the foot-footboard. I was very surprised to see these are made out of medium density fiberboard. Once broken, they more or less look like hardened cardboard. Purchased this bed this week for my daughter's room and was very happy with the product. I assembled it by myself and it took about two hours (I strongly recommend buying a hex bit for your drill, it will shave off lots of "Alan wrench" time). The unit is very sturdy and seems to be fairly high quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Snackbelly_24x7

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Came in several boxes, but packaged well to make putting it together easy. Sturdy and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Dany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bed!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Came early and was easy to assemble. Can not beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Argo

customer_reviews.title: Dream Bed...Bedford Canopy Bed!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bed. It was really easy to put together, and it is really sturdy as well as attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Marie Dedrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Putting it together was a nightmare, but after it was complete it was perfect! I'm very happy with my canopy bed.
customer_reviews.author: nia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and nicely made. We've had it a year already and my daughter still loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: It took me and my daughter a couple of hours to put this together. All the pieces were in the boxes, even extra. It was rather easy to put it together. I put curtain rods with silk curtains all around, then little white lights on the top. I have a haven!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my canopy, was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: blanca

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BED FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING QUALITY!! I was nervous I was going to be cheap and/or lound and unstable BUT it looks like an expensive high end bed!! Don't even give it a second thought BUY it WE ABSOLUTLY LOVE OURS
customer_reviews.author: Karen T.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I only got as far as the footboard. In the 6 pieces in that box, 4 of them had a flaw where the wood had split visibly and the paint pulled apart. There were 3 spots where there had been manufacturing errors that they tried to patch and cover with white paint (but the bed is more of a cream color, so it looked like white out). One hole and been drilled in the wrong spot, so they half heartedly filled it and covered it, but it was still visible. The wood was warped, so one of the main pieces bowed (even after assembling and disassembling to try and adjust the bolts)...all these problems in just the footboard! Terribly disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: NurseKate

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bed for the price. It’s off white, we repainted ours to match the closer to pure white color of the room. It is super sturdy, was easy to put together and is a great value at the price! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing footboard
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive all of the parts, the foot board was missing and we realized it after we began putting it together. It did arrive 6 days early though. I am returning it. Also it is not white it's very beige.
customer_reviews.author: Kierra Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Cream, not white
customer_reviews.text: The color is a very warm white/light cream, not actual white. If you're putting it in a white room, like I did, you can see the color difference easily. It arrived badly damaged from transit, but it was pretty easy to get replacement parts sent from the manufacturer. It was annoying because I had arranged for an Amazon assembler and they had to come back another day. Get a sturdy and strong box spring too - mine broke and I'm not sure if it was the box spring or the bed, but better to be safe than sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Audrey

customer_reviews.title: but the instructions are very clear and easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: The bed arrived in four, well packaged, boxes and all items were wrapped to ensure little damage. It took my husband and I about 2 hours, using our own tools, to put the bed together. Using the tools they provide will double that amount, but the instructions are very clear and easy to understand. My biggest "problem areas" are the decorative trim needing to be caulked (the gaps are pretty bad), and the top ledges for both the headboard and footboard being severely bowed. Once installed, there is a noticable gap at one end of both. Overall, the style was exactly what we'd hoped for though and wont be sending it back for the few flawed areas.
customer_reviews.author: sweethoku

customer_reviews.title: Damage
customer_reviews.text: I got this bed and im disappointed that it is damage.
customer_reviews.author: jamie jones

product_meta.title: Home Styles Naples White Queen Canopy Bed with Hardwood Solids, Painted White Finish, Raised Panel Details, and Curved Legs
product_meta.description: Color:White| Size:QueenUnadorned details such as the straight and curved lines, and slightly flared legs create the contemporary style of the Naples Queen Canopy Bed by Home Styles. Bed is constructed of hardwood solids and engineered wood in a smooth, white finish. Other features include raised panels on the headboard and footboard. Size measures 62.50 inches wide by 87 inches deep by 60.25 inches high.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars59 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
